General.Name: Phoenix Copper Limited
General.Description: Phoenix Copper Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the exploration and mining activities for precious and base metals primarily in North America. The company explores for copper, zinc, gold, lead, tungsten, cobalt, and silver deposits. Its flagship project is the 80% owned Empire Mine property located in Mackay, Idaho, USA. The company was formerly known as Phoenix Global Mining Limited and changed its name to Phoenix Copper Limited in July 2019. Phoenix Copper Limited was incorporated in 2013 and is based in Road Town, British Virgin Islands.
General.Address: OMC Chambers, Road Town, British Virgin Islands, VG1110
